ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] re:brass
ygData.msgSnippet: I trained mine up last week.  I sat in a safe spot in Eastern Wastes and my brass went from 28 to 165.. Took me about 2-3 days letting it run all day while I
ygData.messageBody:
I trained mine up last week. I sat in a "safe spot" in Eastern Wastes and
my brass went from 28 to 165.. Took me about 2-3 days letting it run all day
while I work (I work from home).

And at one point, I had my lute out and was doing a brass song and I still
got skill points.

Notebender
34th bard of Veeshan

----- Original Message -----
From: <EQmagickplayer@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 25, 2001 12:16 AM
Subject: [eqbards] re:brass


> Another place to train are the stone spares off the crocodile beaches in
Oasis. A caiman or two might bother you. But was never bothered by anything
else. Also the ledge above the orc camp in WC worked.
>
> Jovvi Songangel
> Bard of 20 songs
> Drinal
> --
